post.body: was was => she was.
No problem. Sad to hear, but at least she passed away doing something was was good at and loved!
LOL... Good luck. Have you asked the all wise and knowing Google?
does your wife twitter? does she follow you?
sounds like her. Sad to hear. http://tinyurl.com/5p63ae
Let me ask you this... I want to make sure it's the SAME Heather. Sister named Emily? Was she born June 28th? Graduate in 99?
How did you know about it? How did you know her?
It makes me sick... and the fact that she was killed skiing IN bounds!
Yes! My friend and I both know her from High School!
Heather Gross? Did she go to Brighton High School?
Our grandfathers left Europe to escape socialism, and everyone today has forgotten that.
I think it is bcuz the young today (I'm only 26) want to learn everything the hard way. They've never experienced socialism B4.
I wish my wife and I had hobbies that were in common... or something that was remotely in common.
Excellent ... the Constitution and Stealing from Successful Americans are "weak points".
That is why I prefer bullets.
LOL
He's in Cottonwood Heights. Dr. Even Roundy. I know him personally. http://drroundy.com/ Great guy.
Good Question.

I am going now to just START my shopping... and mail books I sold on amazon.com

Hey, where were you last night? Didnt see you on the photowalk?
You know... I am available for hire as a luggage handler. Pay for Room and Board and I'm good.
Sad that Heather Gross, a fellow Brighton Bengal, passed away today in an avalanche skiing in bounds at the bird. http://tinyurl.com/69qm2u

Good News Everyone! From today, the days will start getting longer! (until summer that is, but we wont talk about that.)
Almost ten hours of sleep last night. Wonderful.
Ok, i am more than ready to have this cut on my hand heal. It just kind of split back open.
Playing christmas bingo.
Finished shopping. Time for a family party. Funeral potatos here we come!
is merry christmas shopping.
And i am outta there. Helps when you can chat with friendly people in line at the post office.
In line at the Sandy post office on 2000th east. Line nothing like i expected. Guessing fifteen minute wait.
Anyone else EuroDance fans? #EuroDance #dance #trance #techno
Just finished shoveling. I am running out of places to put the snow! The snow on my parking strip is pile 24 to 32 inches high.
